surges.name: Abrasion
surges.description: Spend 1 Investiture or more to infuse an object or portion of a surface within your reach, making it nearly frictionless; to do so, you must have a hand free and touch the target. This infusion uses 1 Investiture each round, and for the duration, the object or surface slides freely.
surges.short_description: Manipulate friction to make objects or your body slick or rough.

surges.name: Adhesion
surges.description: Spend 1 Investiture or more to infuse it into two unsecured objects within your reach and within 5 feet of each other; you must have a hand free and touch the targets. The infusion uses 1 Investiture each round, and for the duration, the two objects become stuck together.
surges.short_description: Binds things together, creating a Full Lashing to adhere objects.

surges.name: Cohesion
surges.description: Infuse 1 Investiture or more into an unattended object or portion of a surface within your reach that is made of stone; to do so, you must have a hand free and touch the target. This infusion uses 1 Investiture each round, and for the duration, the stone becomes moldable and soft like clay.
surges.short_description: Alter the shape and solidity of objects at a molecular level.

surges.name: Division
surges.description: You can target a character regardless of their size. Spend 1 Investiture to make a melee Division attack against the Spiritual defense of the target, rolling 3d4 spirit damage. To destroy an object or the contents of an area, spend Investiture equal to requirements.
surges.short_description: Decay, burn, or destroy matter with a touch.

surges.name: Gravitation
surges.description: To perform a Basic Lashing, spend 1 Investiture or more to infuse a character or object within your reach; you must have a hand free and touch the target. The infusion uses 1 Investiture each round, and for the duration, the target's gravity changes directions.
surges.short_description: Alter an object's gravitational pull to fall in different directions.

surges.name: Illumination
surges.description: To Lightweave an illusion, spend 1 Investiture or more to infuse it into thin air in a space within your spren bond range. Simple illusions use 1 Investiture every 10 minutes, while complex illusions use 1 Investiture each round.
surges.short_description: Create visual and auditory illusions to deceive or entertain.

surges.name: Progression
surges.description: If you target a living plant (or its seed) with Growth, spend 1 Investiture to cause it to rapidly grow to a size of your choice. If you target a living character with Regrowth, infuse 1 Investiture or more into them. The infusion uses 1 Investiture each round, and for the duration, that character recovers health.
surges.short_description: Heal injuries and accelerate growth of plants or organic matter.

surges.name: Tension
surges.description: To use this surge, spend 1 or more Investiture to infuse a soft object within your reach; you must have a hand free and touch the target. The infusion uses 1 Investiture each round, and for the duration, the object becomes completely rigid.
surges.short_description: Alter the stiffness of objects, making them rigid or flexible.

surges.name: Transformation
surges.description: To Soulcast a material, choose a non-living object or portion of a surface within your reach and make a Transformation test. To do so, you must have a hand free and touch the target.
surges.short_description: Change the material composition of objects (Soulcasting).

surges.name: Transportation
surges.description: Spend 1 Investiture or more to look into the Cognitive Realm where it corresponds to your current location. This allows you to see the true nature of many things around you.
surges.short_description: Move instantaneously between locations or realms.
